controls

Class album_controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • controls.album_controller

  • public class album_controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Jacob Rizer, Terence Williams This is our controller for the album screen which contains photo tiles and functionality to change, copy or move photos.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      album_controller()

      static int get_next() 
      static Photo getActivePhoto()
      Used by other controllers to get the photo selected in this screen.
      void log_out()
      Called when log out button is pressed.
      void move_copy()
      If a photo is selected, goes to screen where photo can be moved/copied to another album.
      void quit()
      Safe quit.
      void remove()
      If a photo is selected, removes it from album and tilepane.
      void setActivePhoto(javafx.scene.layout.StackPane pane)

        Upon opening the screen, all photos in album are loaded into tilepane.

      • createTile

        public javafx.scene.layout.StackPane createTile(Photo photo)
        When a new photo is created this method creates the tile that is to be added to the tilepane.
        Parameters:
        photo - - photo to add
        Returns:
        new StackPane(tile) with image and caption

      • start

        public void start()

      • log_out

        public void log_out()
        Called when log out button is pressed. Goes back to login screen.

      • user_screen

        public void user_screen()
        To go back to user screen with list of albums.

      • quit

        public void quit()
        Safe quit. Save all data.

      • view

        public void view()
        If a photo is selected. Goes to photo view screen where you can see the photo better and can edit its fields.

      • move_copy

        public void move_copy()
        If a photo is selected, goes to screen where photo can be moved/copied to another album.

      • slideshow

        public void slideshow()
        Go to slideshow for this album.

      • add

        public void add()
        Add a new photo by selecting an image file in the filechooser. Adds the new photo to the album and the tilepane. No duplicates allowed.

      • remove

        public void remove()
        If a photo is selected, removes it from album and tilepane.

      • show_stage

        public void show_stage()

      • close_stage

        public void close_stage()

      • get_next

        public static int get_next()

        public static Photo getActivePhoto()
        Used by other controllers to get the photo selected in this screen.
        Returns:
        selected Photo

      • setActivePhoto

        public void setActivePhoto(javafx.scene.layout.StackPane pane)
        Upon clicking a tile, sets the active photo and active pane to the tile that was clicked. The border of that tile turns red.
        Parameters:
        pane -
